scripts.build: npm run build-back-end; npm run build-front-end
scripts.start-local-containers: docker system prune -f; npm run build; docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d
scripts.stop-local-containers: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down; docker system prune -f
scripts.push-linux: npm run push-linux --prefix back-end; npm run push-linux --prefix front-end
scripts.push-rpi: npm run push-rpi --prefix back-end; npm run push-rpi --prefix front-end
